variables.input:
fetch events
| filter dt.system.bucket=="default_security_events"
| filter event.provider=="Dynatrace"
| filter event.type=="VULNERABILITY_STATE_REPORT_EVENT"
| filter event.level=="ENTITY"
// filter for the latest snapshot per entity
| dedup {vulnerability.display_id, affected_entity.id}, sort:{timestamp desc}
| expand management_zones=affected_entity.management_zones.names
| filterOut isNull(management_zones)
| summarize count(), by: {values=management_zones}
| sort values, direction:"ascending"
| summarize values=arrayRemoveNulls(collectDistinct(values))

fetch events
| filter dt.system.bucket=="default_security_events"
| filter event.provider=="Dynatrace"
| filter event.type=="VULNERABILITY_STATE_REPORT_EVENT"
| filter event.level=="ENTITY"
// filter for the latest snapshot per entity
| dedup {vulnerability.display_id, affected_entity.id}, sort:{timestamp desc}
| filterOut isNull(vulnerability.stack)
| summarize count(), by: {values=vulnerability.stack}
| sort values, direction:"ascending"
| summarize values=arrayRemoveNulls(collectDistinct(values))

195.title: Vulnerabilities by risk

196.title: Open muted

209.content:
### Threat exposure template
---
This report template provides a high-level overview of your scoped environment's exposure to the selected vulnerabilities.  
Learn more about this reporting use cases in [Security data analysis and reporting](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/platform-modules/application-security/use-cases/security-reporting)

224.title: Open vulnerabilities

225.title: High

226.title: Critical

227.title: With resolved entities

228.title: With new affected entities

233.title: Related Kubernetes workloads

234.title: Related services

235.title: Related applications

236.title: Vulnerabilities (sorted by risk and total number of affected entities with assessments)
236.query:
fetch events
| filter dt.system.bucket=="default_security_events"
| filter event.provider=="Dynatrace"
| filter event.type=="VULNERABILITY_STATE_REPORT_EVENT"
| filter event.level=="ENTITY"
// filter for the latest snapshot per entity
| dedup {vulnerability.display_id, affected_entity.id}, sort:{timestamp desc}
// now summarize on the vulnerability level
| summarize
{
  vulnerability.stack=takeAny(vulnerability.stack),
  vulnerability.type=takeAny(vulnerability.type),
  vulnerability.cvss.base_score=takeFirst(vulnerability.cvss.base_score),
  vulnerability.parent.resolution.status=takeFirst(vulnerability.parent.resolution.status),
  vulnerability.parent.resolution.change_date=takeMax(vulnerability.parent.resolution.change_date),
  vulnerability.parent.mute.status=takeFirst(vulnerability.parent.mute.status),
  vulnerability.title=takeFirst(vulnerability.title),
  vulnerability.references.cve=takeFirst(vulnerability.references.cve),
  vulnerability.risk.score=round(takeMax(if(vulnerability.resolution.status!="MUTED",vulnerability.risk.score,else:0)),decimals:1),
  affectedEntities=countDistinctExact(affected_entity.id),
  affected_entity.management_zones.names=arrayRemoveNulls(collectArray(affected_entity.management_zones.names, expand:true)),
  affected_entity.vulnerable_component.names=arrayRemoveNulls(collectArray(affected_entity.vulnerable_component.names)),
  nonMutedEntities=countIf(vulnerability.mute.status=="NOT_MUTED"),
  openStatus=countIf(vulnerability.resolution.status=="OPEN"),
  functionsInUse=countIf(vulnerability.davis_assessment.vulnerable_function_status=="IN_USE"),
  functionsNotAvailable=countIf(vulnerability.davis_assessment.vulnerable_function_status=="NOT_AVAILABLE"),
  exposurePublicNetwork=countIf(vulnerability.davis_assessment.exposure_status=="PUBLIC_NETWORK"),
  exposureNotAvailable=countIf(vulnerability.davis_assessment.exposure_status=="NOT_AVAILABLE"),
  exploitAvailable=countIf(vulnerability.davis_assessment.exploit_status=="AVAILABLE"),
  reachableDataAssets=countIf(vulnerability.davis_assessment.data_assets_status=="REACHABLE")
},
by: {vulnerability.display_id}
| fieldsAdd vulnerability.resolution.status=if(vulnerability.parent.resolution.status=="RESOLVED","RESOLVED",
                   else:if(openStatus==0, "RESOLVED",
                   else:"OPEN"))
| fieldsAdd vulnerability.mute.status=if(vulnerability.parent.mute.status=="MUTED","MUTED",
                   else:if(nonMutedEntities==0, "MUTED",
                   else:"NOT_MUTED"))
| fieldsAdd vulnerability.risk.level=if(vulnerability.risk.score>9,"CRITICAL",
                                     else:if(vulnerability.risk.score>7,"HIGH",
                                     else:if(vulnerability.risk.score>4,"MEDIUM",
                                     else:if(vulnerability.risk.score>0.1,"LOW",
                                     else:"NONE"))))
// filter based on the variables
| filter in(vulnerability.resolution.status,$ResolutionStatus) 
         AND in(vulnerability.mute.status,$MuteStatus)
         AND in(vulnerability.risk.level,$RiskLevel)
         AND in(vulnerability.stack,$StackLevel)
         AND in(vulnerability.type,$Type)
         AND (arraySize(affected_entity.management_zones.names)==0 OR iAny(in(affected_entity.management_zones.names[],$ManagementZone)))
| filter $ComponentName=="ANY" OR in($ComponentName, affected_entity.vulnerable_component.names)
// start metric calculation
// | filter vulnerability.parent.resolution.change_date >= toTimestamp($dt_timeframe_from)
//           AND vulnerability.parent.resolution.change_date <= toTimestamp($dt_timeframe_to)
| fieldsAdd vulnerability.title=concat(vulnerability.display_id," ",vulnerability.title)
| fields
  Status=concat(vulnerability.resolution.status," (",vulnerability.mute.status,")"),
  `Changed (days ago)`=toLong((toTimestamp($dt_timeframe_to)-vulnerability.parent.resolution.change_date)/1d),
  Title=if(arraySize(vulnerability.references.cve)>0 AND NOT in(vulnerability.title,vulnerability.references.cve) ,
           concat(vulnerability.title,vulnerability.references.cve),else:vulnerability.title),
  vulnerability.risk.score,
  DSS=concat(vulnerability.risk.level," (",vulnerability.risk.score,")"),
  CVSS=coalesce(vulnerability.cvss.base_score,"-"),
  `Public exploit`=if(exploitAvailable>0,concat("â—","Available"),else:"-"),
  `Public internet exposure`=exposurePublicNetwork,
  `Vulnerable functions`=functionsInUse,
  `Reachable data assets`=reachableDataAssets,
   sorting=exposurePublicNetwork+functionsInUse+reachableDataAssets,
   vulnerability.display_id
| sort   {vulnerability.risk.score, direction:"descending"}, {sorting, direction:"descending"}
| fieldsRemove sorting,vulnerability.risk.score
